# Case Study #2 - Pizza Runner
<img src="https://8weeksqlchallenge.com/images/case-study-designs/2.png" width="600">

This case study was sourced from Data with Danny's [8 Week SQL Challenge](https://8weeksqlchallenge.com/).<br>
For more details about the Pizza Runner case study, such as background and datasets used, click [here](https://8weeksqlchallenge.com/case-study-2/).
___
## Problem Statement
One day Danny decided he wanted to launch Pizza Runner, a 80s retro syle pizza delivery app. He started by recruiting "runners" to deliver pizza from Pizza Runner Headquarters (Danny's house) and paying freelance developers to build a mobile app to accept orders. Using the data he has collected from running his business, Danny wants to better direct his runners and optimize Pizza Runner's operations. 
___
